Privacy Policy
• What kind of Private Information does Field track mobile app collect?

1. Your names, gender, email address, mobile number (to send OTP for registration to be successful). 2. Your real time location information to bring details about your child to you. 3. Technical information about your device such as operating system information, hardware related info, mobile carrier info (if available) just to facilitate quick access of trackers and employees. 4. Access to use media from phone for the purpose of adding profile image to your profile.
• Why is this information collected?

a) Your Parent account is associated to the Field Track app with the help of your mobile number. All vital functions such as GPS tracking, checking out whereabouts of the employee, receive notifications are reliant on the location the app receives thanks to your private details and mobile number. b) Furthermore the required information is used to enhance Field Track team’s research activities for the purpose of increasing the effectiveness of our network and related Services, which then help us in developing new features. c) Also the contact information provided by you shall be used by Field Track to send you relevant app upgrade notices and sponsored promotions (if any). d) Please note that your acceptance to this privacy policy implies you give Field Track every right to contact you by SMS or e-mail for any such promotions or as required for the purpose of tracking employees. e) Effectiveness of GPS tracking and search as per the requirements of the tracker depends upon this information.
• Is My Information Shared with other parties?
No. We don’t share private information with third parties.
• Determining mobile device location

Our Services are reliant on the location you provide, so in order for Field Track to provide you the best offers that are nearest to you we need to know your location. Whenever you use the Field Track App the location information you provide or let us pick from your mobile device or browser (latitude & longitude details) is used to bring to the real time location of the employee. Field Track app further uses your mobile device's ‘background location to provide updates time by time.
• Location Sharing on the Field track app
Please be assured that your mobile’s real-time location is shared with any or anyone. Field Track app brings location updates to you hence required location data.
